WITCH:

MARTHA:
It has...and you know it.

Quite so.

MARTHA.! (VERT SUSPICIOUS) Three weeks. And

WITCH: (WITH EVIL WITCHISH CACKLE)
That's as may be, my dear. In any
case, I have no intention of leaving.
I am going right back to my room.
And if you really think I'm a witch,
you'll be a little careful how you
treat me. (EXIT INTO INN, CACKLING)
